11.content:
Tyler groaned as his alarm went off on his nightstand, reaching over and clumsily shutting it off, the dark haired emo-youth sat up in his bed and yawned, stretching his arms to the ceiling. With this movement, a sharp and sour stink wafted up to his nose. Tye snickered at the familiar and welcoming aroma: His body odor.

He was currently clad in only a pair of loose fitting boxer shorts, his bulge showing quite visibly from beneath. If one got close enough to that area, one would surely smell his crotch musk. He'd been without a shower for two weeks after all...this was Monday and the youth was aiming for a third.

Swinging his legs over the side of the bed, he placed his large sized and bare feet onto the carpet of his room, toes wiggling innocently...feeling the sticky and greasy sweat and grime between and around them.

A gentle knock came at his door and Tyler knew who it was before the youthful voice called from the other side. "Big brooo! Mom already went to work, she said you can make me pancakes! Pleaaase?" Evan's voice called.

Tyler grinned, his younger brother by two years sure loved his pancakes, "Alright! Lemme get dressed and I'll make you all the pancakes ya want!" He called back.

He heard Evan racing down the stairs and shook his head..finally standing up with another yawn.

Glancing over at himself in the mirror, he grinned smugly and flexed his bicep...moreso admiring the greasy black hairs beneath that arm than any sort of muscle definition.

Pulling on his jeans over his well worn boxers, pulling on his unwashed and well worn black socks from the other day, and above all his already pit-stained and pre-worn sleeveless black shirt, Tye was dressed for the day.

His well worn Vans were always kept downstairs in the laundry room...his mother refused to have them sit out and stink up the place.

Opening his bedroom door, Tyler set downstairs.

Tyler was born with size powers that manifested when he was thirteen years old. It seemed to be the first time anyone had manifested this sort of power in Earth's history, lucky Tye! It didn't take long for the hormonal teenager to take advantage of this advantage either.

Pretty much everyone at school knew not to get on his bad side....at least not to the point where he'd go through the trouble of shrinking them. The teachers weren't exactly afraid of him...they knew at least his mother would have something to say should he shrink them, but every so often a substitute or two would go missing.

Tyler had to be treated with caution...one could never know if he would shrink you if he was feeling grumpy that day.

Today thankfully, he was feeling in a good mood. So as he entered the kitchen to see his little brother Evan playing his 3DS handheld game, he ruffled his little brother's hair and asked: "Ya ready for pancakes?"

"Yeah!" Evan cheered.
11.title: Tyler: Teenage Size God

113.content:
Evan always preferred his brothers pancakes to those of his mothers. If it wasn't for his love for smelling like a farm animal, maybe cooking would prove to be a good calling for him! Evan watched with wide eyes as the jumbo plate of pancakes was set before him. Wasting no time, the youth quickly went to work devouring the hearty breakfast before him, Tyler watching happily from across the kitchen, coffee in hand.

As Tyler observed his younger sibling, something stood out to him. He seemed to have a faint glow to him. While the average person probably wouldn't even have noticed, Tyler recognized the signs. This was the same light glow he had developed shortly after his 13th birthday, right around the time he gained his powers of size manipulation. Could Evan be blessed with these powers as well? Before he even gets to speak to Evan, Evan blurts...

"Uh Tye, you're kinda glowing right now. Are you feeling okay?" Evan Asks concernedly.

"Hate to tell you this little bro, but so are you!" Tye teases, watching the fear and confusion ith the face of his younger sibling. Evan then takes a look down at himself and begins to panic.

"What's happening?! Am I dying?! Are you dying?! OH MY GOD, ARE WE BOTH GONNA DIE?!?!?" Evan begins to cry hysterically, before Tye chimes in to calm him down.

"No little brother, quite the contrary. I would say you are just being born! It seems you have developed the same powers as me! Your 13th birthday was last month so now would be about the time they would manifest. No way to know unless we try." Tyler begins to approach his brother before stopping right in front of him.

"Focus on me getting smaller and see if it works. And don't bother trying any funny business! My powers are stonger than yours and I'll make your life hell!" Tyler warned.

"Mhmmm!" Evan nodded in agreement and fear before focusing on his older brother getting smaller and smaller.

Tyler watched in awe as the world around him began to grow larger and larger. While he certainly didn't want to be on this side of the shrinking, he was happy that his brother obtained the same powers as the did. He slowly descended to his brothers height, then he was level with the waist, then the knee, until finally he stood no higher than the big toe of his younger brothers bare foot.

"Woah...." was all Evan managed to utter as he looked down at his bug sized brother. He couldn't believe he was actually part god like his brother!

Down below, Tyler realized Evan was too mesmerized to actually grow him back, so he did it himself. With a smirk on his face, Tyler already had a few ideas in mind for the day. He knew he'd have to train his brother to use his new powers and he thought the best way to do that would be to...

122.content:
"Wait up!" A cheerful voice said from behind you after the lunch bell rang. Turning around after exiting the classroom, you saw your best friend Kota running up to you, waving. "Hey dude!" Kota said once he caught up to you.

"What's up?" You asked as you both fist bumped. Kota threw his arms behind his head as you both walked. You couldn't help but steal glances at those visibly moist armpits on full display. Kota frequently had body odor to spare, but you didn't mind...in fact you enjoyed it.

Besides being Kota's best friend, you had a MASSIVE crush on the orange haired boy. "What's up?! Whaddya mean what's up?! It's burger day!" Kota cheered, aghast at how you could forget.

"Oh...hehe...sorry." You say softly. Kota grinned, "No worries, you just owe me yours." Kota cheekily smirked.

"What?!" You blurted out. Kota doubled over laughing, smacking you on the back reassuringly. "You should've seen your face! Nah, as much as I'd love seconds..I ain't gonna take yours."

You chuckled with a sweatdrop on your head, Kota was such a goof.

As you both stood in line in the high school cafeteria, you had no idea that your life was about to change forever..as soon as you got a bite of those school burgers.

"So...you fall asleep in class again?" You smirk at Kota.

"N-no! Well...maybe a little.." Kota rubbed the back of his head sheepishly. "Haha! I'm surprised your grades don't suffer."

Kota grinned widely, "That's cause you always have my back, dude! I don't fall asleep when you're filling me in and helping me!"

It was true, Kota seemed to pay more attention when it was his best buddy tutoring him. You found it flattering to be honest.

You felt a wave of sadness come over you as you remembered you'd never be able to tell your pal how you REALLY felt. It'd ruin your friendship..especially if he didn't respond well.

Both of you got your trays with those surprisingly delicious school burgers, and took a seat at your usual spot together.

You chuckled as you saw Kota loading down his burger with ketchup. You took a bite of your burger and then...

1222.content:
You blinked in shock as after swallowing the delicious burger you felt a massive environmental shift as wind blasted you and you landed on a smooth floor like surface.

"Ow what the heck was that?", rubbing your sore back you looked around only to widen your eyes at your new environment. Across the ground were giant pieces of cafeteria ware, a plastic spoon the size of a bus and boulder like crumbs.

You felt shock run through you. "W-what i shrunk!?", the ground suddenly shook and you stumbled before looking behind you. Sure enough there rested a large black and orange shoe leading up to a piller like leg dressed in baggy pants. The ground shook once more as the shoe lifted up and tapped.

"I'm tiny and Kota's....a giant.", you felt a rush of different emotions. Shock, fear, and somehow....excitement.

Kota had his eyes closed as he happily munched on his burger, crumbs littered his lips as he swallowed his food. The orange haired boy opened his eyes and let out a deep belch before patting his stomach.

"Man the burgers taste real yummy today! Right budd..", Kota's toothy grin dropped as he looked confused at your sudden disappearance. The boy furrowed his eyebrows as he looked around the cafeteria trying to spot you.

"He left his burger, dude would never leave without telling me something.", Kota rubbed his chin, feeling slightly nervous at your abrupt vanishment. Sliding over to your spot, Kota spotted your phone next to your tray, further confusing him.

Meanwhile you yelped as the shoe suddenly rose and hovered over you. The heeled black shoe sole was strangely alluring, remembering all the times you watched Kota step on twigs or slips of paper. That wasn't even mentioning the sweaty soles you always smelled at sleepovers.

You snapped out of your gaze just as the sole came down, miraculously you jumped to the side getting blasted as the shoe hit the ground. Looking up past the large pant legs you could see Kota scratching his head and letting his sweaty pit breath.

"Where'd you go dude, it isn't like you to ditch on me.", the booming voice of your friend hit you. You frowned as Kota's voice had a sad tone to it. "Oh no he thinks i bailed on him!"

Not wanting to see your friend upset you took a deep breath and yelled. "KOTA BUDDY I'M DOWN HERE!"

The orange haired boy seem to hear you! His face suddenly looked down to the speck by his large shoe.

Kota....

Kota's eyes widened and his mouth dropped open. You both stared at each other for a few moments before the giant orange haired lad leaned down under the table. "Kaito...is that you?!" Kota's booming voice rattled your eardrums and caused you to clamp your hands over them.

"Y-yeah, Kota! It's me...I don't know what happ-WAAH!" You started to answer, only for the goofball to pluck you up and bring you to his gargantuan eye.

"Woaaah..." The orange haired giant breathes, taking no notice of the crumbs still around his mouth. "Dude, you're like a pea!"

"I uh..noticed..hehe." You squeak nervously as your best bud literally was holding you right now. You could see every detail of your friend's face, and you were awestruck at how immense he was...and how he was even hotter up close like this.

Kota placed you in his noticeably greasy palm with crumbs scattered across the fleshy valley. "Maaan, what did this to you?" Kota boomed, concern in his voice.

You were touched that your best friend was actually showing concern. He was a good friend...the best you could ask for.

"It was as soon as I bit into my burger!" You yelled up at him.

"Huh? Weird, why would it only be your burger?" Kota raised an eyebrow as he inspected yours.

"Be careful! I don't want you to shrink too!" You shouted worriedly. Who could you rely on if he was in the same predicament?

Lifting the bun, Kota's eyes widened once again. "Uhh...gross." Kota rumbled.

"What? What is it?" You squeak in anticipation.

"It's uh...glowing." Kota cringed as the thing looked like something you'd see in a science fiction story.

"What should we do?" You ask your giant bestie. Before Kota could answer, the bell rang. "Aw no..." Kota groaned.

Looking down at you with worry, Kota asked: "Should I take you to the nurse or something?"

"I honestly don't think she'd know what to do. Maybe I can...stick with you and we'll figure out a plan after school?" You ask hopefully.

Kota nods firmly, "You got it, your big buddy will keep ya safe!"

Lowering his arm, Kota hummed as he felt his arm sandwich you in his sweaty hot skin. As he made his way to science, the orange haired boy made sure to keep his arm lightly pressed to his body to ensure you stayed in.

You sighed as a splash of greasy sweat slipped into your mouth, the bittersweet liquid was just a part in making you feel safe. The humid and sour pit surrounded you in smooth greasy skin that lightly squished you, not hurting you but more like.....hugging you.

Soon...

Lowering his arm, Mitch couldn't help but flex his muscles as the surge of power flowed through him. Usually Marlin crushed intruders, but when Mitch did it he always enjoyed the pleasure.

What was next?
145212112211111.title: Returning The Favor

1452121122111112.content:
"Well...what do you say we start stomping this place out?" Marlin grinned wickedly, Mitch nodded in agreement. "Yeah! Let's do it!"

Both teen titans stood up to their colossal height, grinning from above at their victims. Mitch went first, lifting his sweating and quite odorous foot that cast entire city blocks in shadow. He wiggled his thick toes before bringing it quickly down on hundreds of innocent people and buildings in a heavy STOMP!

The ground shook from the force of the musclebound menace's stomp, Mitch laughed as people screamed and wailed. Marlin reared his foot back and plowed it through a tall skyscraper...the glass and steel shattering and crumpling like tinfoil before his monstrous appendage.

"Hah! This ought a get our message across! DON'T FUCK WITH US GODS!" Marlin roared in a thunderous voice.

Mitch nodded in agreement, "We'll need to keep a close eye on things back home..the government might try something like a counterattack..and we don't want our tiny family in the crossfire."

"Don't worry, we'll protect them...AND get the others back." Marlin placed a comforting hand on his brother's shoulder.

The boys didn't even notice that local law enforcement had opened fire upon them..how pathetic these insects were!
1452121122111112.title: Some city crushing

14521211221111121.content:
As Marlin and Mitch stomped out of the city, the surviving people of Chromm came out and watched the buff gods leave them finally. Thier city laid in ruins and stuck to the stinky soles of the brothers. A reminder was given to the people, they weren't as mighty as they thought and could be snuffed out like insects.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ted sat on the bed at the home of the village's healer, shirtless. Some mysterious fruit's paste was smeared on his bruises and immediately they healed and the boy felt refreshed. It had been over a hour since he'd seen the godly brothers and a lot had happened such as him having a existential crises....

He was brought out of his thoughts as the ground began shaking in a series of rhythmic booms. He figured that could be one thing. Walking to the door of the healer's home, once Ted opened it he saw all the villagers gathered at the entrance cheering as they stood in the shadows of Marlin and Mitch.

The two giants were holding a group in thier palms gently. Both of them including Marlin were smiling at all of the tinies. Ted laid a hand on his chest and looked at the two with a resolved look.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The two brothers sat at thier mountain as the moon rises to it's peak. All the villagers had gone to rest after a sunset celebration they called "the victory of the gods ballet", as they danced and had divine food and drinks all ending by giving a foot rub to the tired soles of both gods.

Marlin and Mitch were simply relaxing before spotting a tiny walking up to them. They saw it was Ted only dressed in his black pants.

"Huh, Ted what are you doing up?", Mitch asked as he laid a hand down for the teen to climb on.

Ted steadied himself as he was brought up to the space between the brothers and in the aura of thier manly musk being cooled by the night air.

"Well I um..... wanted to talk to you gods.", Ted timidly asked.

"Ask us what?", Marlin asked with a raised eyebrow.

"Um..first I just wanted to that.....the city you attacked.....I'm from there."

The two brothers were surprised by that, Marlin felt his muscles clench as he awaited the next words.

"B-but I don't care about what you did! If anything I'm kinda...glad you destroyed it."

Mitch looked at Ted calmly. "What do you mean?"

Ted fiddled with his fingers. "When I was young my parents died in a accident, it was at a Chromm factory where they didn't earn much money. None of my relatives wanted me so I was sent to a boarding school that had classes for all ages. I was an outcast as everyone there was from a wealthy family and I was seen as being there only because of pity. I hated living there and how no accepted me and left me....alone."

Ted stopped as his voice grew shaky and his eyes watered. He was surprised as he felt a soft pad touch his head and looked up to see Mitch using his finger to rub his head while gently smiling. The tiny boy continued.

"But being here I saw something. Everyone was so close and didn't give me any disdainful looks. They all were overjoyed to see you both and you treated them so kindly. And I realized that I didn't want to go back, so I burned my shirt since it had a Chromm mark on it. So what I'm asking is.....can I stay here?"

The two brothers looked at each other, hearing the story resonated something in them. The feeling of being alone. The two were lucky enough to have each other, but before they found the village they lived in isolation due to their new forms. The new family they formed healed that isolation, and now it was thier turn to heal Ted.

"Ted, your welcome to stay and be apart of our family.", Marlin said smiling as he brought Ted to his face.

Ted's eyes widened as he looked to Marlin who was smiling at him as well. He dropped to his knees as tears ran down his face and he hiccups out.

"T-thank..you sniff, thank you so much!"

Mitch brought the boy to his right pec and gently hugged his into the large muscles. Ted listened to the large heartbeat and took in the b.o that was oddly comforting now. Marlin watched with a smile and was glad he took pity on the tiny.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
After letting his emotions out, Ted was told he could stay with the brothers for the night. He laid on the warm right pec of Mitch as the ground rose and fell. He was still awake as the boys sleeped.

However, Ted noticed that

For the purposes of this story, Alex will also have size poers. Upon arriving home one evening to plop his newly unleashed and raunchy bare feet up on the coffee table...he demands a foot rub from his disgusted little brother.

Squashed you into the floor with his plump foot
151.content:
You sighed as you entered your house. School had been rather tough today and all you wanted was to relax in your bed. However, as you walked into the living room a bad sight greeted you.

"Ah, hey there bro! Was thinking you had detention."

Your older brother Alex was lounging on the couch. On his phone and propping his infamous feet up on the coffee table.

You hoped that your brother would have gotten home later then you. But it was too late.

"Um .....hey Alex.", you awkwardly said.

Alex smugly grinned and clicked off his phone. "Your just in time too. I took a jog earlier and the big boys need some pampering!"

You were about to protest, when a familiar tingling struck your body. You groaned as the furniture around the room started to grow and the tile beneath you grew in width. Soon the tingling stopped, only to be replaced by the booming footsteps that shook the ground.

You looked in fear as your brother stretched into the sky. Alex smirked down at you with his hands on his hips.

"That's better, I think this size fits you more bro!"

The chessy odor of your brothers feet started to attack your nostrils as he wiggled his humongous toes.

"Ready to worship the big boys bro?", Alex asked, even though you didn't have a choice.

You hesitantly nodded causing the titan to grin. "Alright! I can't wait to see you put that puny body to use!"

What did your giant brother do first?

You landed on your rump with a yelp before two familiar fleshy colossi thumped down on either side of you.

You knew without looking that they were your older brother's rank feet.

The stench of unwashed, cheddary feet caused you to cough... eliciting a chuckle from Alex. "Aww come on my teensy weensy bro...they can't be THAT bad! I'd think after all these years you'd be used to.. maybe even feel right at home with my BIG feet." Alex snickered.

You sighed as your eyes were starting to water...he knew damn well what he was doing. He flexed and wafted his bulbous toes and licked his lips in anticipation of his bullying of his tiny bro.

"Anyhow...Its time you show my stinky feet the love they deserve! I think we'll start with..."

The sole beneath the sweat was noticeably rough. Alex usually never wore socks in his shoes. This included sneakers, boots, sandals, and dress shoes. His soles having become incredibly durable, to where he could crush a nail facing up with no damage. The rough soles did luckily give into your fingers, covering your body in heat.

You started rubbing on his left foot, feeling more enthusiastic this time...he was your big brother....he still loved you..it was just hard to remember that at times when he had you smelling these big feet of his. Alex smiled and flexed his plump toes as he groaned and leaned into the couch.

The other jock thankfully retreated inside...but the bigger one wasn't so lucky...and was a lot dumber.

"Nah, I think we'll stay...and there's nothing you can do about it, jackass." Alex gave a sinister grin and stepped out of the driver's side door, tucking the keys in his pocket and coming around the side.

You had started to notice the jock shrinking at a rapid pace..he was the size of an insect by the time Alex came around to your door.

Alex smirked and plucked the now harmless and squeaking curses jock up. "So little bro, ready to have some pizza?" Alex said kindly to you.

153.content:
Name: Mikey Cooper

Appearance: https://i.imgur.com/7TZbK8w.jpg

Age: 14

Story Mikey was born a demigod, once he found out around age 13 that he was a divine being with omnipotent powers...given that he was already a mischievous and cocky boy (as teenagers tend to be)...this only fueled his ego.

Skip ahead to when he is now 14...and he practically rules his entire town...though he is still admired and treated well by his family and neighbors...he isn't afraid to go on rampages or crush people...after all he can just bring them back! His mischief is particularly aimed at authority figures such as snobby teachers at his school.

The teachers struggle to keep a handle on the boy. He can shrink anyone or grow to tremendous heights afterall!
153.title: Mikey the Young Demigod

choices: Decided to torture his teacher more
1531.content:
Mikey Cooper loved being a demigod, he’ll oved his powers that came along with it! He could change his size and everyone else’s. He particularly enjoyed shrinking those who annoyed him down to very tiny sizes and torturing them a little. He also liked being big a lot too. Mikey was kind of tall at his normal size, standing at 6’2”, but he could make himself much much bigger with just a thought.

Currently, Mikey was sitting in his Math class, not really paying attention to what the teacher was saying. He was paying more attention to torturing his tiny History teacher in his shoe. Earlier that day, Mikey got a bad grade on his history test and was so upset that he decided to shrink his teacher down to 1/16 of an inch tall. His history teacher was trapped in Mikey’s shoe, and inside his sock. To Mikey’s teacher, his toes looked to be the size of skyscrapers, he was terrified that he’d be crushed by Mikey’s giant toes!

What happened next?

Mikey decided that it was time to torture his tiny teacher even more. He took off his shoe and sock that he teacher was trapped in and placed the tiny crumb sized teacher on the desk. Mikey concentrated on growing his tiny pet to a more manageable size. He grew his teacher until they were about the size of a small bug. To the teacher, Mikey was still gigantic, just no where near as big as before.

Mikey put his bare feet up on the desk. The foot sweat he accumulated throughout the day made them smell absolutely awful to a normal size person, but for Mikey's tiny pet it was incredibly amplified. The smell was almost unbearable! It was torture, he could barely breathe!

Mikey laughed as he saw his tiny, bug sized teacher struggling to even breathe. He said, "This is what you get for not giving a God and A on a stupid test! You better get rubbing before I decide to crush you!" The teacher, terrified, of his gigantic student did as instructed and rubbed Mikey's colossal, incredibly stinky feet.

What happened next?

The fact he was in complete control and no one would dare speak out against his crude behavior was quite an ego trip for the young lad.

Mikey grinned and crossed his feet over one another, cockily flexing his big toes and leaning back with a smug grin on his young face. The student in front of Mikey turned around and shot a grossed out look his way.

"Got something to say?" Mikey sneered, how dare a mortal look at him like that!

"Yeah...your feet stink." The student snapped, clearly he was a new student who didn't know how things worked around here!

Mikey chuckled, "They do! Why don't you take a closer look?" With a mere thought, Mikey had shrunk the boy down to the size of an ant and picked him up.

"I think I'll put you riiight between my big toe and second toe...that place REALLY reeks!" Mikey thundered, his voice hurting the miniscule brat's ears.

Joey still stands up to Mikey

Mikey looked at him and said, "I hope you learned your lesson! Next time, I'll be forcing you to mine toe jam!" The teacher, still effected by the smell of Mikey's feet, didn't want that to happen and ran out of the room terrified.

Mikey looked down to in between his big and second toes to see his new slave taking in his surroundings. It was hard for him though, thanks to the absolutely horrific smell coming from Mikey's feet. The now tiny student started coughing, hoping to catch his breath some how. Mikey, disgusted at how his new slave was reacting said, "How dare you cough at the smell of your master's feet. You should be on you knees worshipping them you insect!" Somehow, the student managed to find the courage to say, "Your not my master! You just shrunk me and put me here! And I'm not an insect, I'm a person and my name is Joey!"

Mikey, furious with how his new slave was acting, squeezed his toes together to try and get his message across. Mikey leaned his face closer to his feet and said, "Well 'Joey,' I don't really care. You are now going to be my exclusive slave and I'll so what I want with you because I am a God! You will obey me or you will suffer the consequences!"

"Alright, worms...you're coming with me!" Mike's thunderous voice rattled the citizens' ears and caused the buildings to vibrate.

The sun was blocked out by an enormous sticky hand that scooped the entire city up on Mikey's fingertip. Holding it before his colossal eye, he realized that he would have to give it some form of protection if he was to carry it home.

Smirking in at the screaming populace, Mikey tucked the now fully protected city into his pants pocket and continued his walk home in this stifling heat.

“So...what are you guys gonna do now?” Alex asked. “I mean...won’t people go into full blown panic if you go into town or something?”

Ash hummed as he looked up. "It's getting kinda late, we can chill out here and maybe take a stroll through town tomorrow."

Tyler grinned as he groaned and stretched. "Sounds sweet, can't wait to mark the town as our stompin ground!"
15411111111111.title: Continue I

154111111111111.content:
Alex smiled at the thought of his giant friends walking through town, no one would mess with them then! Mitchell was soon pushed back into Ash's sole, his desperate squeaks not even being heard. Ash soon scooped his small friend into his palm, adjusting his sitting position.

"I can give you a lift home Alex, it is getting dark.", Ash asked bringing his hand to his face.

Alex thought about it before shaking his head. "My dad had to leave on a quick trip, so I can hang with you guys tonight!" The smaller boy said smiling as he relaxed on the soft palm of his friend.

Tyler smirked as he started lounging back into the trees more. "Maybe you should sleep on Ash Alex, bet his booty is comfier than any bed!"

Ash flushed and looked away, Alex laughed at his friend's embarrassed look.

Alex smiled and looked up at Ash, he'd always somewhat had a crush on the cute emo..him being a giant only strengthened his feelings.

"Maybe... up by your face." Alex smiled cutely. Ash blushed, but nodded. Tyler scoffed, "Kinda boring choice... but whatever."

Alex pouted as Ash put him up near his cheek, "Where was I supposed to pick!? It's my choice…"

Tye chuckled and pretended to glare, "Watch your tone with the great Tye, shrimp."

Ash rolled his eyes, "Great Tye? Pfft."

They all shared a friendly laugh as the sun fully set. It was a hot, humid night...the giants new sweat mixed with the old.

The forest was being fumed by the miasma of teen boy giant aroma...even as they slept.

The thunderous snores of Tyler led campers to believe some monstrous Sasquatch was nearby. In addition the musky stench of greasy sweat made them think some sort of terrifying alien beasts were inhabiting the woods.

Alex peacefully slept as he nuzzled up on the white haired boy's cheek, feeling the warm skin and snores helped lure him to sleep as well as strangely the smell coming off of the brothers.

After a nice night of emitting their musky b.o throughout the woods, the sun began to rise on Saturday morning. The campers had fled the woods after not only the musk being strong but their fear had gotten too large. If they had stayed they would have noticed the strange effects of the musk, the trees and grass seem to become greener and more full. Additionally more plants began sprouting faster than before.

Ash snoozed while Tyler was already awake. The black haired boy smirked as he started crawling over, raising his arm to open his greasy pit again. Just as he was about to place it in front of Ash's face…

"Don't think about."

Ash opened his eyes and gave a deadpan look to Tyler about to once again wake him up with his odorous pits. The emo chuckled as he sat down and crossed his arms.

"Hey I didn't want you sleeping in!", Tyler chuckled as he stretched his arms. "Gotta make our mark on the town!

Ash hummed before lightly rubbing Alex's back to wake him up. The small boy yawned as he stretched and was soon scooped up onto Ash's palm. "Huh it's morning?"

The white haired boy smiled and nodded. "Yeah we're ready to go for a walk."

"Ah awesome, can't wait to see you guys stomping around!", Alex grinned as he rubbed his eyes.

Standing up, the ground shook beneath the two giant brothers. The tiny prisoners were once again squished into the sweat and gunk of smelly feet. Alex sat on top of Ash's soft white hair, getting a view of the giant height.

Throughout the town, the ground began shaking as the boys began stomping out of the woods and into the streets.

At a park near the lake, a group of young boys were hanging out. These were Tyler's friends he usually hung out with and showed off his smells to. On a branch in a tree, a boy with bleached blond hair was relaxing as he thought of the missing friend in their group.

A shadow suddenly fell over the group, the bleach blond opened his eyes and saw a humongous figure blocking out the sun! “W-wha?!” He nearly fell off the tree branch in shock.

Another boy who was wearing a beanie and had messy brown hair beneath it skidded to a halt on his skateboard. “Whoa! What’s going on?!” He stopped in front of what appeared to be a gigantic set of grimy toes in a huge flip flop.

The toes wiggled and wafted off a rank cheesy stench to the boys. The smell was strong and almost unbearable but somehow..familiar. “Wait...that smells like...Tye’s feet?!” The blond boy squinted up at the figure before it seemed to crouch down to them.

“No way…” Another boy with shaggy hair gasped. Tyler grinned in a friendly way as he crouched over his puny friends. “Sup guys? How do ya like the new me?” He boomed.

Ash and Alex had went on ahead, figuring Tyler would like to spend some time in the spotlight with his friends. Indeed they were right, Tyler was thoroughly enjoying the awed faces looking up at him.

“Dude...you-....you’re HUGE!” The boy in the beanie said with a dropped jaw.

Tyler chuckled as he put his hands on his knees looking at all of his tiny friends before his huge feet. "Yep, guess now's a good time to tell you guys. Me and my bro got some pretty size powers we've been enjoying!"

The blond boy blinked before grinning. "Thats...awesome man! Your smell is totally bigger too.", the scent of the chessy feet began fumigating around the park.

Tyler grinned as he stretched his arms, letting his greasy pits breath. The sour musk poured out as he the emo boy put a palm down before his group of friends. The group all hopped on, watching in awe as Tyler lifted them up and near his opened pit.

"Yep was strong enough as is but this a nice boost!", Tyler watched as his friends took curious sniffs and coughed at the powerful musky scent pouring out.

The beanie boy chuckled as he was hit by the powerful scent. "You said your bro is a giant too?"

Tyler hummed as he plopped his rear down and made a THOOM. "Yep he's off with his friend, me and Ash are planning on showing our size around town and I decided to surprise my buddies first."

15421.content:
In a nice apartment on a sunny day, a teen was arriving home. Closing the door behind him was a tall boy with long maroon hair in a messy bun. He wore jeans and a black tank top, he kicked off his flip flops as he walked into his apartment.

However rather then a foot, a large foot like paw stepped onto the floor relaxing as the thick paw pads were cooled. The teen's whole body morphed and soon was no longer a human but that of a anthropomorphic lion. Leo pulled his mane out of the bun as he sighed.

"Man staying in that form for that long really tires a guy out!"

Walking to his room, Leo felt his tail move excessively as he grew excited. He'd been at school all day and his toy was bound to be lonely. Entering his bedroom Leo looked to his bed in excitement but soon felt confusion.

"Huh, where is he?", the anthro starting looking over his bed. He growled as he grew frustrated. A smirk grew as the lion suddenly had an idea.

Stomping over to a discarded pile of socks, Leo scanned the numerous wet smelly footwear before chucking as a small lump was spotted moving in one of the dirtiest ones.

"Ah ha!"

Reaching down and picking up the sock, Leo flipped it so the opening was above his palm. Rather then dirt or lint a inch tall human fell onto the large paw. The human teen has short brown hair and looked up in awe/surprise at the cocky snout above him.

"I should've know, you can't keep away from anything related to my feet can you Zed?", Leo smirked as the tiny human blushed.

"S-sorry you were gone....and I missed you."

Leo soon smiled as he nuzzled Zed with his snout. He usually would shrink humans down and have his fun before erasing any memory of the incident. Zed however not only had a thing for feet but also really liked anthropomorphic animals called furries. So the human became one of Leo's permanent toys, and the anthro really grew to care for the human.

Leo pulled away and smirked as he placed his other paw on his hip. "Still sneaking away from my bed, my naughty human deserves a punishment!"

Zed held no fear just excitement at what Leo had planned

"Now then....

choices: Calin wants to play stomp again
154213.content:
Meanwhile in the apartment across from Leo's apartment, something different but similar was happening.

A tiny man in his mid twenties across the giant living room. He soon hid under the couch as loud thumps were heard and the ground shook.

Coming into the room was a boy about 13 years old. He had shoulder length spiky black hair and was wearing a purple shirt with black pants. Oddly on top of the boy's head were a pair of cat ears with dark purple insides. Down at the boy's bare feet, they weren't actually feet put paws like Leo with large purple pads on each toe, the ball, and heel.

The young catboy had a playful smirk as he looked over the ground of the livingroom. He began to hum as his paws stomped the ground.

🎵Stomp Stomp Stomp, Squish Squish Squish.
Soon the bug will be smooshed real quick!🎵

The tiny tried to sneak out from the couch, staying out of the young boy's sight. He froze when a loud "Ah Ha!" rang out and the ground shaking intensified. Soon a shadow loomed and the man looked up.

The catboy was looming over him as he smugly grinned. The giant then rose one of his large paws of the speck at his feet.

"Hehe, got you now bug! Time to get squished!"

The paw came down and pinned the tiny to the ground. The soft paw put its weight on him, the stinky smell of the many barefoot adventurers they faced hit him. A sweaty stench with some grass scent.

The catboy's smirk soon turned into a happy grin as he plopped himself on the floor and tilted his paw. The pad beneath his toes had the man stuck and embedded in the purple pad.

The young boy then plucked the man from his paw and held him in his palm. He chuckled as the man shook his head to focus.

"Haha Kris I got you!"

The man known as Kris soon smiled as the catboy laughed. Kris was a 23 year old cashier who had a pretty normal life intill the youngling entered.

The catboy was known as Calin, a demi-human from the same world as Leo. He was scared arriving in the world populated by humans, he was homeless and used his new powers to steal food. However Kris on the way home from work didn't treat him like a nuisance but asked if he need help.

Calin took up residence with Kris, enjoying a nice home and food. The human was like a big brother/father, but Calin was too embarrassed to say that out loud.

Kris was kind and even helped satisfied the demi-human's playful nature. This wasn't the first time he'd gotten smooshed by those paws.

"You sure did, your really fast buddy.", Kris chuckled as Calin brought the human up and pressed the human to his cheek while purring.

Soon..

15422.title: Jaden the Gamer NEET

154221.content:
The afternoon rays of sun shone brilliantly on the blond hair of the youthful teen who was currently just starting to wake up. The time was currently two in the afternoon...and Jaden had spent all night gaming and eating junk food. So, it was no wonder the only reason he was waking up an hour earlier than his normal time (that of course, being 3 pm), was that a thumping was coming from his front door.

"Ugh...what the fuck...?" Jaden grumbled as he considered rolling back over and hoping they'd leave.

THUMP THUMP THUMP!

Jaden scowled and sat up, swinging his jean-clad legs over the side of his bed and yawning. As the boy stretched, he chuckled as his pit stains were exposed and an all too familiar scent of his own ripe b.o hit his nostrils. He had slept in his clothes, which he had neglected to change for the past few days.

Slipping his funky unwashed-sock clad feet into his ratty sneakers, he stood up and scratched himself lazily. The NEET stepped over the mess on his bedroom floor and strode out to the living room. Jaden's house was furnished at the bare minimum, just in case he had friends to come over and game or smoke pot or something.

The obnoxious knocking continued until Jaden yanked the door open to see his grouchy neighbor glaring at him. The nosy busybody didn't get a chance to yell at him for whatever it was this time before Jaden shrank his ass to a mere 3 inches tall!

The grumpy neighbor wasn't sure what happened, he was about to complain to his slob of a neighbor when he suddenly found himself staring at two colossal sneaker-clad feet! Looking up, he saw two towers of blue fabric...until the sky darkened and the sticky, unwashed hand of Jaden scooped him up.

He screamed as he was held in front of the delinquent's face, who proceeded to blast a Hot Cheeto scented yawn in his face. "I don't appreciate being woke up to be bitched at, old man..." The titan of a boy boomed lazily, before turning and re-entering his home...shutting the door behind him.

Trekking back into his home, Jaden stretched his arms above his head. The musky smell of his pits was soon let out as the teen ignored the panicked yells of the shrunken man in his fist. BRRRRRRRGGGGHHPP

"Huh you saying something old man?"

Jaden...
1542211.title: A Big Neet's Life

15422111.content:
Grunting a bit, two moist pops were followed by dull THUDS towards the end of the bed. Jaden wore a relaxed face and he sighed...as the stink of his foot odor wafted up his body and assaulted the neighbor's nose.

"Ugh! What is that?!" The neighbor demanded rudely. Jaden smirked, "Take a look for yourself, gramps." The teen took another swig of soda and belched crudely as the neighbor turned towards the source of the offending odor: Jaden's colossal and rancid looking socked feet down in the distance.

The sight was not a pleasant one to behold, Jaden's socks had been worn even longer than the rest of his current attire. They were threadbare and several holes littered the surface, his big and grimy toe on his right foot stuck out of a hole all its own.

"Since you made me get up outta my cozy bed and walk to the door...you can slip those old socks off and give my bad boys a good rub." Jaden said with a lazy yawn.

"WHAT?! You can't be serious! You return me to normal right n-" The neighbor's rant and refusal was interrupted...by yet another belch...this one even worse than the last.

URURURURUGUUGUGGURRP!! The belch was so long and powerful, the neighbor was blasted back off of Jaden's musky shirt. The poor man tumbled down the length of Jaden's jean clad legs..and landed directly on the socked feet.

"Haha, look at you! I didn't even have ta' lift a finger to get you down there! Alright, pull those things off...unleash the beasts!" Jaden snarked as he relaxed.
15422111.title: Wanted some foot fun

The tiny neighbor desperately tried to block the sweaty and chessy fumes being emitted from the huge soles. Jaden frowned as he took a final sip of his soda, crushing the can and tossing it. The can dropping to the floor made a clanking sound that blasted the tiny's eardrums.

"Hey shithead, I gave you an order. My feet are feeling sore and a tiny guy like yourself should help. Now start rubbing or I'm gonna squash ya flat!", Jaden smirked as his booming voice frightened the man.

Smoosh

Kamui's nose soon was attacked by a strong potent stench, his brother's cheesy sweat odor was squished into him along with the plump sole.

15422222.title: Other

154222221.content:
Deep within the woods of the feudal era blockade country, many strange in mysterious things could happen. People may see signs of spirits or creatures much more ferocious than a bear, which of course often lead the forest bare to only those wishing to train their spirits and mind.

A log launched into the air before being followed by a yellow blur. The blur soon spread out its tails and brought it's heel down almost instantly cracking the log into multiple smaller pieces. The blond boy grinned as he landed on the ground and caught the pieces with one arm.

Mitsue hummed as he whipped the sweat from his forehead, getting a brief hit of his bitter pit stench. The kitsune's muscular body was glistening with sweat as the warm humid sun had been beading down on him the whole afternoon.

"Huhhh Mitsue your cutting up more wood?", an owl asked as it tilted its head. To others they would hear only hoots but to Mitsue he could understand the creatures like that of a human.

Throwing the wood onto a bigger pile, Mitsue patted his hands before smiling. "I know it seems strange but i promise i wouldn't do all of this if it was just training!"

The owl hummed as it flew back up to it's nest. "I'm assuming i won't get a full answer than?", Mitsue chuckled as he put his toned arms behind his head. "Sorry but when I'm done with my project I'll be sure to tell!"

Mitsue sighed as he smelled his b.o leaking off him. Training in martial arts and his abilities often made him smell, he didn't really mind but he was worried about grossing him out....
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In a village near the woods lived a young man age 17 named Shiro. He felt both weighted down and trapped by the village he was in. He grew up here and learned lessons along with living each day woth the residents.

However he was an outcast, he dreamed of leaving to explore the world and do more then farm. This earned scorn from his family and villagers, both thinking him foolish to not follow their way of life.

Shiro often ventured off when the scorn was too much, exploring the woods and the beauties of nature helped heal his trapped spirit. During one of these trips he had nearly passed onto the next world as a demonic beast nearly slayed him. However he was saved by a boy looking to be his age with the ears and many tails of a fox.

Shiro watched in terror and awe as the blond boy appeared before him, with a few swips from his blade the beast was down.

The village boy didn't come to his senses until the kitsune boy knelt down before him with a concerned look. "Are you right?"

Blinking, Shiro nodded. "Y-yes thank you!", the kitsune smiled as he held out a hand and held Shiro up. Shiro flushed as his face was leveled with the muscular chest of his savior.

"Its dangerous to be out here, not every creature will be scared off. Oh I'm sorry my name is Mitsue!", Mitsue chuckled as he rubbed the back of his neck.

"My...name is Shiro. S-sorry i just needed to get away for a bit.", Shiro awkwardly said.

Shiro had given his misfortunes to Mitsue, talked about his desire to not live in a close minded village. Mitsue was sympathetic and told him not to give up on his dreams or lose hope.

This soon turned into a pattern as Shiro would go back to visit the kitsune and watch him train. Mitsue was his first true friend, always loving to talk and even giving him a hug (which did get the smelly sweat on him).

Eventually Shiro asked finally a life changing question, if he could stay with Mitsue. The kitsune was hesitant at first as living in the forest was dangerous and he didn't want Shiro at risk, but the bluenette human soon convinced him and Mitsue said he'd have a surprise in a few days for him.

Shiro soon made his way through the tall and imposing trees, symbolizing the darkness over the forest. Soon through the trees appeared a clearing, and in the clearing was his kitsune friend.

"Mitsue!", Shiro smiled as he ran up to the kitsune stretching in his red pants. The blond boy smiled as upon looking the shorter boy glomped him, Mitsue returned the hug. "Hey Shiro glad you could make it!"

Pulling out of the hug, Shiro crinkled his nose. "Have you been working out?", the bluenette said as putting hos face against his friend's pecs had him taking a whiff of the sweaty b.o.

Mitsue chuckled. "Guess it's obvious huh? Sorry was trying to get in some last minute training."

Shiro flushed as he looked off. "I-it's ok i don't mind! I kinda...like it, i can smell the effort going into your training."

The kitsune blinked surprised at the compliment before lightly blushing himself. "Oh...well thank you!"

Putting his hands on his hips, Mitsue smiled. "So how about i show you a new technique i formed?"

"Really what is it?"

Mitsue....

Alfie

Age: 18

Bio: Alfie is a Scottish boy who lives a lonesome lifestyle, though it's probably due to his usual grumpy demeanor and foul language. He often spents his days in a home by the sea delivering mail for a living.

What people didn't know about the boy was that he was a Selkie, a mythical creature that could turn into a seal and human. Swimming and experimenting with his powers was one of the few things the redhead enjoyed. Unfortunately sinister organizations are often after Alfie wishing to capture him. Luckily these organizations are quite incompetent, sending rookies to try and catch him.

What's more is the rookies often use shrinking dust to sneak into Alfie's home. Half the time Alfie doesn't even notice them and obviously crushes them under his large boots and body..
154222222.title: Other

choices: Alfie shows the facility his anger
1542222221.content:
Yesterday had been a long day for Alfie. Mother nature decided now that the sun was going to blast them all. His paper run was an extra five minutes after an entitled mom decided to lecture him on how hard he throwed the newspaper. Long story short the redhead called the mom a few unsavory things and by the end the little goblin was repeating him to the mom's horror.

Today didn't seem to be off to a great start as he felt no cushioning at all in his bed. His normally vozy and slightly b.o scented bed was now hard and cold like a floor....

"The fuck?", sitting up Alfie's green eyes widen as instead of his room the Selkie was in a small prison like cell! The metal bars created a barrier from the outside world to Alfie's prison. Despite the cool metal, Alfie still had drops of sweat leaking downed his toned body and he could feel his sockless plump soles pressing against his boots while squelching.

"Alright i wanna find the tart who put me in this damn cell!", standing up Alfie walked to the bars. Suddenly a zip sound rang out as the sliding doors opened, through came three men, one in glasses and lap coat while the others were in a uniform.

Adjusting his glasses the man in center spoke firmly. "Ah your awake, was hoping you wouldn't be knocked out for too long."

Alfie growled. "Who the fuck are you! I ain't a damn experiment so you better let me the hell out!"

"Unfortunately thats not the plans young man. After countless rookie missions failed we finally got you, and we don't intend to lose you."

The lead scientist nodded to the other two before they took positions outside of Alfie's cell. Walking out, Alfie yelled at the scientist. "Eh get back ere you bastard! I've got better things to do than waste time here!"

The doors slid closed behind the scientist and Alfie grumbled as he started pacing in his cell, echoing his tapping boots. Pausing Alfie suddenly grinned smugly as a thought hit him, when he was out in his seal form yesterday he helped some fae caught in a discarded net. They in thanks taught the Scottish boy a new magic called Size change.

"Alright i think I'll give these posh arses a nice surprise!", snapping his fingers, Alfie's body began to glow. Walking up to the bars Alfie took a breath before grabbing them and pulling them apart with his muscular arms. The guards quickly pulled out guns and aimed. "FREEZE!"

"Ah what's the problem, you wee little worms thinking you have some power ere? I was having a crappy day but now i think i can fucking salvage it!", the blue glow brightened and the guards backed away in shock.

Alfie's form began to expand in width and height, his toned frame beginning to head towards the roof of the building. The sweaty b.o his body was shedding now spread like mist into the air, getting the guards to pale at the stench and size of the giant boy. Alfie soon stopped at 120 ft, his redhead just moments from crashing through the ceiling.

Looking down, Alfie saw two specks around his boots which in actuality were the guards. The guards dropped their guns and began to sprint towards the door, they were blasted back as the giant rose his left food and planted it in front of them. A crater formed and a earth shaking force sent the guards flying back until they crashed into Alfie's other boot.

"Huh look like we got some pests ere? Better get rid of em!", Alfie smirked as he rose his large booted foot above the guards by 20ft. The tiny men paled as the large sole filled with boot treads loomed over, Alfie's toned arms clenching his fists as he now had the power to crush them with a step!

Stomping down a faint CRUNCH rang out as Alfie made the ground crumble and reduced the men to paste. The Scottish boy nodded in satisfaction as he swiveled his boot to smear the tinies into his treads.

"There got some annoying ants taken care of, now where's the basterd that put me here!", Alfie boomed getting the walls of the facility to shake. Lifting up his boot and showing the two dots of red on his treads, Alfie lightly kicked the wall which resulted on the whole thing crashing and breaking to pieces.

What's next?
1542222221.title: Alfie The Selkie

choices: Alfie Slowly Crushes The Scientist in His Pit...AFTER Some Answers!
15422222212.content:
The wall crumbled open to reveal a spacious hangar with many vehicles. Mostly vans and even a plane in the corner! Each vehicle had a mysterious symbol on the side and the initials S.S.R.F. Alfie didn't even have to crouch to avoid bumping his head on the ceiling as he stomped forward. "Well, lucky fuckin' me! Plenty of space...AND plenty o' more ants to get rid of." Alfie cranked his knuckles threateningly, the effect like thunder on the tiny guards and worker's ears.

That was when the scottish boy spotted a certain someone. "OI!" He roared, his voice shaking the very walls. He saw that cocky scientist from before, looking VERY scared as he attempted to use his keycard to escape. "FIRE!" A guard screamed as every security officer began to fire their sidearms and rifles at the titan.

Their weapons were quite ineffective, however they did annoy the temperamental giant. "KNOCK IT OFF! FUCKIN' FEELS LIKE A MOSQUITO!!" His voice was so loud that it caused the guards to drop their weapons to clutch their ears.

Swinging his leg forward, he kicked a van on top of the stunned security guards. Those who weren't crushed were soon engulfed in the explosion. The Selkie's attention turned to the now hysterical scientist who had become so panicked he dropped his keycard multiple times.

Licking his lips and stomping forward, Alfie crushed the flaming wreckage beneath his treads with ease. A display of power he was pleased to see scared the nerd even more. "I'm comin' for ye puny science nerd!" He thundered as he delighted in the fact that as his shadow fell over his prey...the dork seemed to be sobbing in fear.

Squatting down, Alfie grinned wickedly. "Ye fuckin' brainiacs always talk big! But when it comes down to eet...ye always piss yer wee trousers!" Alfie snatched the screaming scientist up so fast it gave the runt whiplash.

"What was tha' ye were sayin' about me not leavin'?" Alfie said in a sinister tone.
15422222212.title: A Puny Scientist at Alfie's Mercy

choices: He comes across more faculty members
154222222121.content:
The scientist shook in fear as he was forced to look up at the towering redhead, attempting to look away would only bring shoulder and neck pain from his whiplash. He was firmly squeezed in the boy's sweaty hand as Alfie brought him up to his pissed off face.

"Ho-how they said nothing about you bein..g a giant?!", the man stuttered in terror. Alfie rose an eyebrow as he blasted the man with his hot and foul breath. "Huh who de fuck are they?"

The scientist widened his eyes as he realized he gave away a secret. "U-um i can't tell you, but if you let me go i can let you out!", he pathetically pleaded, his ears ringing from the booming yells.

"What are ya yapping about. Sorry to say ant but i don need yer help, I'm going to get out of ere even if i gotta crush everything!", the redhead soon smirked as he lifted up his muscular arm to reveal a patch of fuzzy red hairs. A new heavy odor full of sour fumes poured out as trails of greasy sweat dripped down the vast underarm.

"Now give me answer on who de fuck is behind this and i might not squash ya pathetic body in me ere pit!", flexing his arm Alfie made his sweaty and plump pit stretch which made the sweat squelch out over his matted down pit hairs.

Coughing from the sour fumes, the scientist was now more out of options. If he ratted out the people in charge he would face the wrath of THEM, but getting shoved into the raunchy pit of a merciless giant wasn't pleasant either!

"Eh ant get ya head outta your arse and tell me who the fuck made you lock me up! Me pit aren't getting cold anytime soon!", Alfie tched as he tightened his grip getting the scientist to yell out in pain at the feeling of his rips compressing under the pressure.

"OK OK!", the scientist yelled getting Alfie to relieve the pressure. "Their the Supernatural, Scientific and Research Facility! Their an organization, they focus on capturing and studying mythical creatures! Were Scientific division 03!"

Alfie's eyes narrowed as he clenched his teeth. "I don take kindly to basterds who go after my kin or others. Tell me where the leader of this organization is so i can give him a fuckin welcome!", the redhead growled getting the eardrum to boom in the scientist's ear.

"I don't know! I'm only given information on the other division not the Main HQ!", the scientist pathetically thrashed against the sweaty skin. "I told you who was responsible now please let me go!"

The giant tched before smirking. "I said i migh' let you go, but I'm feeling a wee little pissed! I THINK GIVEN MY PIT SOME FOOD IS BOUND TA CHEER ME UP!", the tiny's ears popped as blood dripped down, he wasn't focused on the pain as he felt dread fill him.

Pinching the coat of the scientist, Alfie started bringing him to his red haired pit. The scientist's yells were muffled as he was pressed against the squishy and greasy skin. The sour odor made his eyes water and burned his nostrils from the intense odor. The shadow of Alfie's buff arm darkened as the giant lowered his arm, soon the firm muscle pressed the tiny into the squishy and greasy sweat smeared pit.

"Ahhh that's better, feelin you pathetic ants beneath me is always a delight! Hope it's na too much since your suppose ta be the mighty scientist.", Alfie taunted as he licked his lips and flexed his arm. The giant smirked with his teeth as he felt a tiny CRACK and muffled scream against his sweat glands.

"Heh yer a joke, spouting about how you wanna study me. I've seen your fuckin studying me and de other don't appreciate all the hell we get put through!", Alfie scoffed as he began to rub his arm against his side, feeling the puny runt easily get enveloped in his reeking armpit.

The scientist was in a miserable state, as in addition to the cruel taunts he was sure his rip had snapped from the muscle compressing him in the smothering and sour cave. Alfie pressed his arm harder to his side getting the scientist to scream and taste the warm and greasy sweat as his arms snapped.

"Alright let's finish this ya ant, thanks for the fun but i don't want my pit ta starve!", Alfie licked his lips as he flexed his arm before pressing it as hard as he could.

CRUNCH!

Alfie smirked as he felt the body pop in his smoldering pit. Lifting up his arm, along with the sour stench a faint trace of blood followed. The redhead hummed as blended in with his pit hair was a tiny red splat. The scientist completely obliterated by his crushing flex.

"Now than, where de fuck is this S.S.R.F?", Alfie questioned as he began stomping across the vechile bey.

Soon....

Zeffrey

Age: 16 (Human years)

Bio: Zeffrey is a Celestial. A type of being that exists on the far reaches of space, existing as something similar to angels. His people appear the same as humans only with skin-colors that range from blue to purple and orange. Zeffrey is a happy-go-lucky and playful (if not somewhat mischievous) young celestial.

He departed his home dimension to find the world of the humans, his curiosity drove him to find the far flung planet Earth. Due to his powers being limitless and far reaching as the universe itself...he is bound to cause a commotion!

Upon his arrival, he forgets how enormous his people are compared to 'less-evolved' lifeforms..and plops down in the middle of a city at close to 100 ft tall!
1542222222.title: Zeffrey the Celestial

choices: Zeffrey Lands in a City! Uh oh! (100ft.)
Zeffrey Lands in a More Rural Location (50 ft.)
15422222221.content:
The year is 3050, humanity has long since mastered space travel and colonized other planets. By 2030 hyperspace travel was made a reality. Shortly after that, humanity made contact with intelligent life on other planets. Trade between planets is now commonplace, as is conflict and diplomacy.

Despite all of humanity's progress, there are beings who have yet to reveal themselves to not only mankind..but any alien races.

They are called the Celestials, existing within a dimension far removed from our reality. The top ranking among them are known as the Overwatchers. They are in charge of monitoring and studying all species in existence. It's a mundane job, especially for those who are saddled with the non-sentient lifeforms.

Those who are not given the title and rank of Overwatcher, exist in a day to day life not dissimilar to that of other races. Every Celestial possesses near limitless power to bend reality and do whatever they wish. However, to keep their people from destroying themselves..each Celestial wears a power limiter bracelet.

At age 16 in human years, the Celestial Zeffrey is chosen to be the first to make contact with the outside universe.

*****

"Woah! Really?!" Zeffrey blurted out, practically bouncing with excitement. He was standing before the High Council of Overwatchers. The purple skinned being in the highest throne somewhat smiled at the lad's eagerness.

"Yes, young one. You will be sent to the planet of humanity's origin..." The purple being said. "Earth?! Awesome!" Zeffrey cheered.

"Sigh..are we really sure this is a good idea?" A orange skinned Overwatcher complained.

"The lad seems a tad..too eager." Another one with green skin groaned.

"Young Zeffrey, you will be the first of our kind to make contact with the outside. Your power limiter has been removed, you are free to utilize your abilities however you wish. I take it you understand the responsibility you have?" The purple one spoke again.

"Yes sir! I do!" Zeffrey said, saluting.

"Hm, then be off." The purple skinned humanoid waved the young Celestial on.

Zeffrey nodded, closing his eyes...he began to concentrate..and in a flash he vanished...his consciousness travelling across light years and a sea of stars to the blue and green planet.
15422222221.title: Zeffrey's Journey

choices: Bend down to get a closer look.
154222222211.content:
Across the dimensional plane of the universe was the familiar solar system of humanity. Various moons that once been research facilities were now full on cities housing millions of humans and other extraterrestrial beings. The use of generators and atmosphere control allowed the once cold rocks to be like that of earth.

Speaking of earth it had gone through significant changes. Thankfully many countries had new reforms to stop government corruption and stop petty biases from stopping development. The population was around 3 billion now due to the colonies developing and new cultures being formed around the space homes.

Still greed was part of human nature, and an organization of criminals and terrorists formed called the Ravens. They operated in secret and even went as far to construct an artificial island off the coast if Chile, utalizing illusion devices to stay undetected. Little did they know, quite the visit was coming.

Fufufufu.....
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zeffrey blinked open his eyes as he floated in the solar system, the blue boy looked in awe at the large green and blue sphere. He remembered learning about humans, they were intelligent and striving creatures who paved the way for greatness.

"This is gonna be sick! Wonder what the humans do for fun, OH i bet they got great food!", Zeffrey beamed with a toothy grin as he started soaring down to the glowing planet.

However, something the boy didn't take into account was if there could be a size different as beings in his dimension hadn't been here.

The alien clenched his fists as he stuck his feet out and prepared for a landing. The flat soles of his green sneakers had a large star with a Z printed on it. Spotting a gray surface in the distance of blue Zeffrey closed his eyes as he hummed and prepared for his entrance.

Meanwhile below thugs conversed about potential deals as they wandered in the slums of the city. Everyone looked up as a strange sign was in the sky, looking like stars with Z's coming down.

Out of nowhere the stars suddenly came all the way down and instantly flattened a building beneath them. A massive shockwave was scent inyo the ground as the object was revealed to be a giant sneaker. From those sneakers was a titanic teen with blue skin and a slim build dressed in green highlighted clothing.

Zeffrey grinned as he spread out his arms. "Hello humans nice to meet you!", the booming voice shattered the windows and made the shocked humans clutch their ears in pain.

Lifting an eyebrow, Zeffrey put his hands on his hips as he wondered where the humans where. There was land just a second ago?

The bright eyes of the giant looked down and put dread into every witness as they looked up at the towering boy.

Zeffrey....
154222222211.title: Zeffrey Lands in a City! Uh oh! (100ft.)

choices: Zeffrey Unleashes His Big, Sweaty, STINKY Feet!
1542222222111.content:
"Weird, what's the deal with all these bugs?" Zeffrey boomed out while scrunching his cute nose. The dread the humans felt increased tenfold as their brains processed this event. A blue skinned boy of colossal size just dropped out of the sky! The building he had crushed effortlessly beneath his sneakers had been a key Ravens hideout.

Instantly they began to panic, fleeing for their lives. Zeffrey's eyes widened, "Woah...you little bugs must be some kind of parasite that invaded Earth! That's not good..." Zeffrey didn't like the thought of some kind of alien parasite taking over and harming the humans!

I don't have the permission to really interfere...but I'm sure the old guys back home wouldn't mind! I bet I'll be saving humanity! It'll be like I'm their hero! Zeffrey thought to himself, finding the only rational course of action (in his boyish mind).

Gaining a determined glare, Zeffrey lifted up his right foot out of the devastated area where he landed. Bringing it over the bugs, he promptly dropped his foot...obliterating the fleeing masses of criminals into hundreds of insignificant blood specks.

********
One of the leaders of The Ravens was being briefed on the situation. "So...what you're saying is some giant..boy...dropped out of the sky and just HAPPENED to land on one of our hideouts?!" The shadowy figure demanded.

"Y-yes sir, we're not sure where he came from...."

"This MUST be some kind of new weapon or trick!! But how could the authorities and the government have come up with something like this right under our noses?!" The boss demanded. "Shall I call in the attack?" The meek attendant inquired.

"No...let's see what this brat does first..." The boss calmly stated. "We mustn't act too hastily."

********

Zeffrey wiped sweat from his forehead, flicking it off to splash into some of the buildings his mere act of speaking had bust open.

"Phew! Stomping out bugs is hard work! I hate to say it, but you little guys might have to put up with my BARE feet stompin' ya! Hehehe!" Zeffrey chuckled and grinned toothily.
1542222222111.title: Tiny Pests

choices: Zeffrey stomps more humans for his new collection!
15422222221111.content:
Zeffrey grew a bright gleam in his eyes as he pumped a fist. "I think giving these bugs some sweat outta teach them to mess with the humans!"

Looking down at the scurrying specks, Zeffrey chuckled as he stepped onto the heel of his sneaker. "This might not crush you as much but lucky for me I'll have some stickers for my sole!"

Pulling his large foot out of the sneaker, a trail of steaming odor followed. Like mist, the steam spread a rank and salty vinegar odor throughout the streets, making the humans gag as the funky stench invaded their nostrils.

Zeffrey was known not only for his active lifestyle but also just how much sweat he could garner. He didn't wear socks to. His pale blue sole was practically swimming as it baked in his hot sneaker. Zeffrey's sole were quite meaty and plump, squelching as the alien flexed his sole. Reaching down, Zeffrey yanked off his other sneaker sighing at his hot feet being unrestrained. Bringing the footwear to his face , Zeffrey chuckled as he took a whiff of the powerful vinegar.

"Alright you pest let me show you how us Celestials deal with you worms!" , Zeffrey grinned mischievously as he tossed his sneaker aside, easily crushing another building to rubble.

Lifting up his foot, Zeffrey wiggled his plump toes sending drops of hot smelly drops down to the streets. The humans were soon hit with the bucket sized sweat drops, some were face planted as the drops threw them to the ground. The vinegar stench burst from each drop, sending the stinky stench more over the humans.

Looking up, the sky was holding the huge plump sole and the grinning face of Zeffrey. The sole glistening with sweat as the alien stomped down and shrouded the humans in darkness.

A squish noise rang out Zeffrey's foot squashed around ten humans alone under the ball of his foot. The alien chuckled as he felt the pathetic squirming against his plump sole, the pest were only spared as his squishy foot had enveloped them in his sweaty sole.

"Comfy? I'd like my stickers to be nice and warm!", Zeffrey laughed as he swiveled his foot to squash the humans more into his foot.

What was next?

Roni

Age:18

Bio: Roni is a rare wizard known as a Dorian, his ancestor was gifted power from the God of Darkness Kuro. This of course gives Roni a handful of magical abilities. One of which is going to other worlds, some of which may be smaller than ours...

Roni is friendly but also a little shy, often spending his time watching anime and playing games. He is often accompanied by Kuro who in modern times appears like that of a white haired neet teen. The god keeps an eye on Roni after a promise to the wizard's ancestor.

The boy has a somewhat athletic frame and a round bubble butt he might sit on something or someone with. His large feet are adorned by timberland ankle boots which depending on the situation could crush cities.

Still Roni is shy to being a giant, luckily Kuro is happy to help.
1542222223.title: Other slot

15422222231.content:
Roni happily watched his laptop, humming to the upbeat anime opening as he swayed his head to the music. He had gotten hooked and as a result hadn't really gotten washed up, his thick cotton socks were quite damp and his blue long sleeve shirt along with his grey sweatpants had some sweat stains from his A/C shutting off last night.

From the boy's bed a black cat yawned as it stretched, opening his crimson eyes the feline rose an eye at Roni still watching his show. Hopping off the bed, the cat poofed in a cloud of zmoke as in it's place was a young white haired man in a black cloak.

"Your still watching that, don't your eyes feel sore?", the new figure said bending down getting Roni to jumped surprised.

"Ah Kuro!", Roni blinked before chuckling. "Heh sorry but it's really entertaining the heroes are doing battle with the villains i need to see them win!"

Kuro looked amused before pulling the boy up. "Look i know you like your anime but how about we take a break and get some fresh air."

Roni sighed before waving his hand, a purple aura glowed around his curtains before they suddenly opened. Against his window, numerous raindrops fell and showed the grey skies. "It's been a downpour for the last few days, can't really get out."

Rubbing his chin, The God of Darkness soon smiled as he snapped his fingers. "Well we don't have to get out here we could get some fresh air in a different realm!"

Roni waved his hands. "W-what, Kuro last time i traveled between realms i ended up in the step of that giant pink haired guy!"

Kuro rubbed Roni's shoulder. "Look you rushed that time, just focus on being bigger this time and you'll be good!"

The wizard sighed before smiling, reaching down Roni pulled on his orangish brown boots to hold his sweaty socks. "Ok it's worth a shot! Plus who knows what's out there to explore?"

Kuro nodded before stepping aside. Roni took a breath before concentrating. Soon a magical circle appeared before them glowing and making winds fly throughout the room. Soon the circle opened up to show a bright sky.

"Great job! Now lets get going.", Kuro grinned as he and Roni hopped into the glowing portal.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Roni grinned as he made contact with the ground. No giant blades of grass or furniture, that meant he wasn't tiny!

"Kuro i did it! We're not the size of bugs.", Kuro smiled as he rubbed Roni's spiky hair. "Yep i knew you could do it."

As he was giddy Roni noticed something strange. While it appears they were in a field of grass the ground was reacting strangely. Just standing it appeared as if the ground was cracking beneath them, as if the weight was unsettling it.

"Huh the ground seem off to you Kuro?", Roni asked taking a few steps forward to see with each step the ground crack more under his boots.

Kuro suddenly narrowed his eyes. "I'd stop walking if i were you."

Roni blinked and stopped his next step, holding his large foot above the ground. What Roni didn't know was that if he had stepped down than he'd be crushing a whole village worth of tiny humans.

"Huh what's wrong Kuro?", Roni asked bringing his foot back next to his other one.

The God walked up next to the wizard and looked fiwn. "I sensed some life near us and i wanted to investigate. Luckily you didn't crush them yet."

Looking down, Roni looked in surprise as before the toes of his boots was a strange tiny gathering. Strange faint squeaks made their way up to the giants.

"Whoaa Kuro what are those?"


The God looked unimpressed as he wiggled his pale and sweaty toes, shaking up the ground for the tiny humans below who yelled in terror.
15422222231.title: Roni The Wizard

choices: Slipping his foot out of his boots
Taking a seat...either on or off the humans
154222222311.content:
Kuro hummed as he ran a hand through his white hair. "Oh those are a bunch of tiny humans.", the god nonchalantly as he looked at the speck before them.

Roni widened his eyes as he stepped back in worry. "Wait what! No how the heck could those be humans that i almost stepped on?!"

Shrugging the god crouched down before reaching down and casting a shadow with his palm. The tiny humans went into panic mode they picked up wooden spear like weapons. A barrage of puny stick flew and hit Kuro's hand, not even scratching his pale skin. The giant narrowed his eyes as he plucked up a tiny man between his finger and thumb.

"You probably ended up in a different dimension that doesn't have the same space, hence why we're giants.", the god said bored as he began to role the tiny between his fingers getting tiny squeals of fright. "Not to mention giants to some annoying specks."

Roni blinked as he watched the god messing with the tiny. "K..kuro what are you doing?"

Kuro chuckled as he set the tiny on his palm, having the warm skin be like a landscape. "Roni up until now you've ended up shrunk, don't you want a chance to be the big guy?"

The wizard slowly walked back aware of how he created earthquakes beneath him. "Are you sure Kuro, we can't just with some village in another dimension?", Roni said worried still.

The god sighed before his red eyes suddenly glowed. Kuro could see black aura over the village, signs of these humans having dark feelings within them. "Roni these aren't some ladybugs, these are the scum of humans. This village is merely a ford for thieves and murderers, you shouldn't give them your kindness."

The tinys below shook in fear as the giant lashed them with his indifferent gaze. Suddenly Kuro stood up and lifted his large and sweaty foot, a group of citizens below couldn't even yell out as Kuro stomped them. The god smirked as he felt the puny squirming against his large foot, snuffing out the evil of the world is always fun.

"Now Roni, take a chance to show these bugs their place.", Kuro said swiveling his foot. Roni flushed before nodding, these bugs needed to be punished even if it was embarrassing.

Roni began by....
154222222311.title: Lowly Humans

choices: Roni peels off his socks to squish the tinies more
1542222223111.content:
Roni looked off with a flush before stepping on the heel of his boot. The wizard grunted as he began to pull his foot, feeling his large foot adheared to his damp insole. Finally his socked foot emerged and with it a strong cheesy stench, the socks tinted green and damp as they hugged his large foot.

"There you go, now show these bugs the crushing power of a Dorian.", Kuro smugly grinned as he crossed his legs letting his sole with multiple tinies stuck be on display.

Gaining a smile, Roni nodded with a determined look. Lifting up his foot Roni covered the tinies in a shadow and sent an aura of thick cheese as his crummy sock filled their sky. Roni lifted up his foot high as he clenched his fists.

"Ok you bugs better be ready! I'm...sure you find my s-smell welcoming!", Roni boomed trying to sound intimidating.

Regardless of the attempt the villagers were definitely scared as Roni suddenly stomped down. A loud squelch rang out as the sock squeezed out stinky sweat as the tinies vanished under the crushing foot. Roni hummed as he could feel the tiny pests through his socks, it was strange yet nice feeling such pathetic squirming under his sweaty sole.

The villagers unfortunate to get squished were somehow alive. The sock fabric in addition to Roni's plump and meaty sole didn't crush them like the sole of a boot would have. Still being under the foot was torture, they were consumed in the heat and smell of Roni's cheddary soles the sock was already packed with sweat but more drops seeped out from the plump sole to force more putrid stink on them.

Kuro grinned as he absentmindedly sandwiched his pest between his sweaty soles to squash them more. "There you go! Really showed them their place."

Roni chuckled as he still felt the squirming. "They feel pretty funny under there actually!"

What's next?
