Nate Edgeworth

Age: 17

Bio: Waking up in a futuristic city with lost memories, Nate was lost and spent his days trying to figure out his past while dealing with the strange characters in this forgein city. However, among his search he discovered a strange ability, upon enveloping his arm in red energy he can change the size of others and himself. With this power, Nate joins the Security Patrol, using his power to take out top level criminals. After all who can say they literally crushed someone like a bug?

Personality: Nate is stubborn and can come across as a punk, not backing down should he be insulted. He does however have a heart of gold and protects the innocent while stamping out the bad. Of course he doesn't pay to much attention to his bathing as he usually gets round up in work or activities.
15422222232.title: Other

choices: Slip off his shoes and use his feet
154222222321.content:
"W-what the hell-!"

CRUNCH

A faint noise rang out in the alleyway, to anyone normal it sounded like a simple step and twig snapping. However the crunch was emitted as a red shoe flattened a speck, the shoe belonging to a long leg leading up to a unimpressed boy.

"Damn you were annoying.", Nate scoffed as he leaned onto his foot, swiveling his heel to make sure he thoroughly crushed the crook.

Sighing Nate leaned against the wall, casually scraping his shoe to rub off the red splat. Scrolling through his phone Nate checked off the face of the bug he just crushed. Fred Yin, a drug trafficker and murderer, eliminated.

"Consider yourself lucky i crushed you that quick, i would've made your death long for all the shit you've done.", Nate coldly said before dragging his foot to get off the blood. The teen began walking out of the alley, leaving the tiny red splat mark behind.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Nate had his arms behind his head as he walked into Security Patrol H.Q. the black jacket made the swest stains invisible all while having his sour odor seep through.

"Alright, just gotta check out and i can go home.", Nate sighed as he walked towards the checkout.

"Oh Nate hold on!", a bubbly voice called out.

Looking over his shoulder, Nate found his coworker Rena a kind bluenette who always wanted to be kind to Nate. The spiky brunette blinked before surpressing a blush. "Hey Rena what's up?"

Rena smiled nervously. "Well...you know those goons you shrunk yesterday?", Nate nodded raising an eyebrow. "Yeah?"

The bluenette looked sheepish as she held up a bug case. "I'm sorry! Boss wanted you to interrogate them, i know you had the weekend off but i guess i assumed you'd want to."

Nate blinked surprised before glancing at the case, sure enough four half inch tall goons were staring up in terror as their shrunker was looming over. Taking the case from Rena, Nate gave a smile. "It's ok I'll take care of them, heck it'll give me something to do."

Rena smiled before bowing. "Once again I'm sorry for randomly recommending you, but thank you for the last minute task."

Nate waved his hand. "Hey it's cool, don't worry."

Upon checking out, Nate made his way to his apartment. It was decent sized and had enough to make it homey. Setting the case on a coffee table, Nate threw his red shoed feet up, filling the bug's vision with the soles that crushed scum.

Nate considered interrogation, what method should he use?

15422222232221.content:
It was the afternoon in the town of Kugura, in a high school students were chatting as they waited for the teacher to arrive and teach the last class of the day. Some where talking about the latest store that opened or the newest manga volumes. However there was also a rumor being discussed...

"I'm telling you i saw it, some guy shattered Mr.Nakagawa's car with a flick of his finger! He just snapped and BLAM the window broke!", a brunette passionately explained pumping his fists.

A small group of friends were chatting about the latest rumor to hit the town. Supposedly a "dark spirit" was running around causing havor, like breaking car windows or disrupting local appliances.

"Come on Ryo do you really believe that?", a blond girl asked with a raised eyebrow. "The principal said it was likely a group of delinquents."

A boy with glasses hummed rubbing his chin. "Still Mr.Nakagawa said he wasn't in the store for even a minute. A group would have to shatter the windows and escape, and no one saw any suspects fleeing. Additionally only the windows were broken, surely there would at least be a dent."

Thump!

The group were startled as a thumb came from behind them. The cause was a pair of brown leather shoes being thrown up on a desk belonging to a boy with brownish red hair.

Fukase had a amused smirk as his eyes were closed. His arms behind his head as he lounged back, show damp spots on the underarms of his uniform. Swaying his feet, Fukase opened his orange eyes.

"You're all more chatty then usual, like a bunch of seagulls.", Fukase joked giving a shit eating grin as most of the group grew tick marks.

Ryo however blinked curiously. "Um..Fukase your family used to work at a shrine right? Did they ever talk about evil spirits?"

The boy rose an eyebrow as he uncrossed his feet, leaning forward. "I was told spirits can't do much here so don't worry. Last thing we need is a Mystery gang around our oh so quiet school."

Before Ryo could question more, the door opened and the teacher entered. Fukase grinned. "Better sit down for class pipsqueaks."

The group grew fires of irritation at being belittled by their classmates. Soon the class was all seated and the last class began, as everyone dozed off or took notes, Fukase tapped his cheek.

"As funny as the stunt with Nakagawa was i better look into it, looks like I'm taking a detour home.", Fukase hummed.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In the back alley of a building, a dark haired man smirked as he took a purple jem out of his pocket. Holding it out the man narrowed his eyes as the jem began to glow, a pulse was sent into the building before him.

Inside the shop keeper yelled in panic and shock as the appliance began to fly around, smashing against the wall or risking hitting him. It was a...poltergeist, a yokai was possessing his items!

The mysterious man cackled as he heard the frightened cries, however he grunted in confusion as he heard the graval move near him. "I closed off this space..how could-"

"Gotta say that barrier's pretty weak, an imp could tear it down.", Fukase nonchalantly said, walking up with his hands in his pockets. The boy grew a smug grin as he stopped a few feet away. "Soooo... i take it your this evil spirit right? Who would've known, it was actually a petty thief who stole the chaos charm."

The man gritted his teeth as he pointed his hand out at Fukase, conjuring a purple sphere. "The fuck?! Piss off brat!"

However within a split second, Fukase's hand glowed orange before he smacked the hand out of the way. The smack was strong enough to make the crook yelp in pain as he was sent flying into the wall, bracelet falling off.

Pocketing the charm, Fukase hummed as he walked towards the man grovel crunching under his shoes. The boy smirked as he snapped his fingers and watched the figure before him begin to dwindle down in size. Soon the man was the size of a thimble, staring up in terror at the boy looming over shaking the ground under his steps.

Fukase showed teeth with his smirk as he set his foot on it's heel, letting the brown leather sole hang over the size of two buses.

"I could crush you now, I've put these shoes through a lot and not letting them squish a thief wouldn't be fair. Taking a sacred charm is a punishment worthy of death. So how about you convince me to not lower my foot and be satisfied by the crunch I'll make of you.", Fukase chuckled darkly, a shadow casting over his eyes.

The tiny....

154222222322211.content:
"W-wait! Please! I didn't steal that!" The thief wailed as the leather sole began to slowly lower. Fukase scoffed and let out a cruel chuckle, "Get real, you think I was born yesterday? You stole this from a shrine, like the sneaky little vermin you are."

The thief squealed as the shoe continued to lower, "N-No! It was sold to me!!! I swear! It's a website! it deals in illicit goods like that!"

Fukase narrowed his eyes, halting his shoe's descent for a moment.

"I shouldn't believe a word this doomed worm says. But a black market for magical items has been a problem for awhile. I thought I'd stomped most of them out in this area. But...I guess they just went underground." Fukase lowered his foot once more, getting a delightful scream from the thief.

"What's the website? Hurry up...my shoe is thirsty for your blood." Fukase darkly said as he licked his lips.

"N-no way! You gotta turn me back to normal and let me go!" The thief demanded, getting back some of his nerve.

"Tch, you think you're in any position to bargain with a big dude like me?" Fukase put his hands on his hips and gave that smug grin.

The thief paled and sweated bullets, "W-well....you ain't getting nothing out of me unless I have a guarantee!"

Fukase's eyes were cast in shadow for a bit longer, before the giant chuckled and gave a cocky grin. "Gee, you might not be just some dumb thief after all...fine. I can still crush you any time I want though...remember that." The leather sole left the thief's view and the bus-sized shoe slammed to the gravel by its mate.

Fukase squatted down, making himself look all the bigger to the thief and his uniform pants hug his shapely rear. "Kay, we're heading to my place...but I certainly don't plan on taking it easy on ya. You're still a sneaky little thief who should be paste under my shoe right now." Fukase said with cruelty as he snatched the thimble-sized man up in his fingers.

Where does the thief 'ride'?

15422222232221111.content:
Fukase cruelly ground his arms against his sides as he walked home. The summer heat was making him sweat bucketloads and he loved the fact that this puny thief was baking in the stank prison chosen for him.

Fukase licked his lips lustfully as he felt the waterfalls of sweat leaking down his sides and moistening his pits. The futile squirming of his captive brought him much joy and feelings of total power.

The thief was feeling much less positive about his place in the world right now. The greasy flesh he was glued to stunk horribly and sweat squelched all around.

The only air he could get was filtered through this sweaty young man's sweat glands..and it was so hot and humid in here that he really did feel like he would smother.

The sun bore down on Fukase as his big feet grew tired and slightly sore. His uniform socks sopped up gallons of perspiration from his juicy feet.

Finally, Fukase arrived at his home on the corner. Walking up to the front door, he unlocked it with his key and entered.

"Ahh~...home sweet home, eh maggot?" He sniggered as he gave his arm a good squeeze.

Stepping inside and closing the door, the cool a/c greeted his sweating body gratefully. Popping off his leather school shoes, he sighed once more as the steaming shoes were kicked haphazardly into the corner. His socks were adhered to his feet like a second skin, he might remove them later...perhaps.

Stepping into the living room, he flopped down on the couch and propped his dogs up. He began to peel his school jacket from his sticky body. Tossing the pit stained garment across the arm of the sofa, he grunted as he relaxed and folded his arms behind his head.

Closing his eyes, the smug giant let his pits feel the cool air of the home...and felt the slightest twitch from a certain bug he'd trapped for the walk home. Gaining a toothy grin, he looked down at the area.

The thief saw a colossal copper colored eye leering at him as he was thanking his lucky stars for the air.

"Well well...the bug's still alive after all!" Fukase's voice boomed.

..What now?

Teen boys in size situations has always been a popular writing subject for me and I know many others! So I figured I'd create an interactive dedicated solely to that very thing!

Vore,feet,sweat,odor,armpits,rampaging,crushing,pliable, shrinking, growth and cruelty are ALL encouraged and permitted! Pretty much anything and everything barring scat and toilet is!
